name: Dreaded Depots
description:
Dreaded Depots is a jorror game where you are trapped in a wearhouse of the furure and you try and escape it, Surviving the monster and Completing the puzzles. Ihope you have a good time playing it, and see you if you are subbscribed to my channel!

Note : This is my first Game ever made, please understand any bad builds or gameplay. I would like to get some of your feedback too!
